name: Don't be Square
description:
Don't be Square is a game where you have to fight the incoming enemies coming in from all sides and all sizes. As you shoot them, they grow until they pop... so don't get to close or else all of your progress will be lost.

This is my first ever game so i wouldn't expect much. i didn't know how to make a paus menu, and when i made the main menu, it kept glitching so i don't have one of those either. 

Have a great day, i hope you enjoy.
